fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Chapter Engagement with Drill-Down
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to create a master-detail report showing chapter-level engagement summary followed by top members within the most engaged chapter.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Create a chapter engagement report showing each chapter's member count, event participation, and average member tenure in a chart. Let me click on any chapter to see a breakdown of their top 5 most active members. Then from that member list, I want to click on a member to see their detailed activity.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing chapter engagement metrics
Chart supports drill-down to show top 5 members for selected chapter
Multi-level navigation is clear and intuitive
Final member table allows opening individual member records
